text: Dries Van Nieuwenhove (born 9 April 1998) is a Belgian track and field athlete who is specialized in the 400 metres hurdles. Van Nieuwenhove represents Belgium at international competitions. After winning the bronze medal at the 2020 national championships and silver at the 2021 national championships, he became Belgian national champion in 2022. He competed at the 2022 European Athletics Championships in the 400 metres hurdles event. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Belgian athletes Category:Hurdlers Category:Living people
title: Dries Van Nieuwenhove
